name: UpdateStockAllocationRule
description: Allows updating a StockAllocationRule. Only `Value`, `ValueType`, `RefillPeriodInDays`, `Priority`, `StartDate` and `EndDate` can be updated. To update the other fields, the rule must be re-created.

properties.name: Priority
properties.description: In case there is not enough stock, Priority is used to determine who gets preference. A higher Priority means a higher preference.
